arm_group.description: Patients of all races of any gender who are at least 5 years of age with a defect in thymidine phosphorylase may participate in this natural history study.

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a multi-center natural history study of MNGIE (Mitochondrial NeurogastroIntestinal
      Encephalopathy).   Patients will be followed over time to assess clinical symptoms.  The
      investigators hope to learn more about the disease of MNGIE as well as develop useful
      measures of disease status  for use in future clinical trials.

      Additional clinical centers will be listed as they become available.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Natural History Study of Mitochondrial NeuroGastroIntestinal Encephalopathy (MNGIE)

detailed_description.textblock:
The investigators will examine a total of 20 patients at six month intervals for up to five
      years.   The investigators will evaluate gastrointestinal function, lean body mass,
      neuropathy, neuropsychological capability, quality of life, nutrition, motor function and
      biochemical parameters.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Thymidine Phosphorylase (TP) defect:

               1. homozygous or

               2. compound heterozygous mutations in the TYMP gene, and/or

               3. TP enzyme activity of <20% of normal.

          2. Increased plasma Thd > 3 micromole/L

          3. Increased plasma dUrd > 7.5 micromole/L

          4. Age requirement of at least 5 years of age.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Participation in an interventional (study medication or other experimental
             intervention) study (within 1 month of participation in this study).

          2. Unable to travel to site for research visits.

          3. Unwillingness to sign informed consent form.

          4. Substance abuser

study_pop.textblock: Male or female, At least 5 years of age, with Thymidine Phosphorylase defect

clinical_study.official_title: The Rare Disease Clinical Research Network Natural History Study of MNGIE

other_outcome.description: A short assessment of cognitive function  will be performed.
other_outcome.measure: Score on Mini Mental State Exam

primary_outcome.description: The timed water swallow test evaluates the time it takes to swallow a small cup of water

reference.citation: Martí R, López LC, Hirano M. Assessment of thymidine phosphorylase function: measurement of plasma thymidine (and deoxyuridine) and thymidine phosphorylase activity. Methods Mol Biol. 2012;837:121-33. doi: 10.1007/978-1-61779-504-6_8.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: A general neurological exam will be performed to assess the degree of neuropathy.

collaborator.agency: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke (NINDS)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
